oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Broadside announcing Low Rates to Nashville, via Interurban Account, Tennessee State Fair, September 21-26, 1914.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Fairs; Tickets
Broadsides; Fairs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Fair
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Tennessee State Fairgrounds opened October 20, 1891, for harness racing. The grandstands could seat 7,000. Auto racing was held there beginning in 1904, and the first State Fair opened in 1906.
